ResearchTabDef.label: Steamworld
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Unlock technologies that are common on steamworlds, planets in the state of 19th century Earth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: field guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build breach loaded a rifled cannons, designed to use on the open field.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mitrailleuse
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a mitrailleuse type volley gun, mounted on a carriage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: repeating gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a carriage mounted repeating gun, a predecessor of the machine gun.

ResearchProjectDef.label: salvo gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a crank operated salvo gun, holding multiple breach loaded barrels in a single row.

ResearchProjectDef.label: explosive crates
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fill wooden boxes with highly volatile explosives. As they are originally meant to be only transporting devises the need to be ignited manually.

ResearchProjectDef.label: volley guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make firearms that consist of multiple barrels to shoot more rounds at a time. Unlike automatic weapons each barrel needs to be loaded and fired manually.

ResearchProjectDef.label: air guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make guns that use pressurized gas as a propellant instead of gunpowder. These are somewhat cheaper and a little more silent but weaker.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wooden munition
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make firearms and artillery shells out of wood, saving precious metal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: steamworld melee
ResearchProjectDef.description: Forge more sophisticated swords and maces using industrial components
